resources.string: You lose. The belugas dominated you...
You win. You have destroyed the belugas!
You win. You have evaded all the belugas!

How to play: The player selects a difficulty or selects New Game to generate the board. If the player clicks on a square that is a beluga, he loses. If the player makes a long click on a square where there is no beluga, he loses. If the player succeeds in uncovering the correct squares or kills all the belugas, he wins.
